title: The Magic of animation
creator_credit: Rick Butler, Good Day Productions and Ontario Educational Communications Authority
brief_description: A look at the people and techniques involved in the production of animated films. Includes interviews with animators from the United States, Canada, France, Holland, Poland and Yugoslavia intercut with excerpts of some of their works. Written and narrated by Rick Butler, Camera by Richard Stringer, edited by David Maltby, sound by John Uhtoff and title design by Vergo.
